name: Stratos International
overview: Stratos International, Inc. engages in the design, development, and manufacture of radio frequency (RF) and microwave, as well as optical subsystems, components, and interconnect products used in telecom, enterprise, military, and video markets. Its optical products include multi-source agreement compliant transceivers; specialty transceivers; military and harsh environment components and subsystems; video components and subsystems; CWDM components and modules; optical flex circuits and multifiber assemblies; optical and copper expanded beam and physical contact harsh environment connectors; specialty fiber components and assemblies; and optical connectors and cable assemblies. It also offers two copper product lines, Trompeter and Semflex. The Trompeter product line includes RF connectors, patch jacks, installation tools, adaptors, cable, and cable assemblies. The Semflex product line includes flexible microwave frequency bulk cable and cable assemblies; flexible microwave frequency coaxial cable and custom cable assemblies; and custom connectors, adapters, phase trimmers, and other components for special application requirements. Stratos International sells its products through a network of representatives, distributors, and direct sales professionals primarily in North America, Europe, Asia, and Central America. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois. Stratos International Inc. operates independently of Methode Electronics Inc. as of April 30, 2001. As of July 12, 2007, Stratos International Inc. is a subsidiary of Emerson Network Power Connectivity Solutions, Inc.
